category: Product > materials, treatments and surfaces (including paneling)
description_html:
A custom designed I-MESH curtain, during the last four years has been the leit-motive at Walter Knoll in their booths and shops. In 2017 Ippolito Fleitz for Walter Knoll approach is more conceptual than before. They utilized I-MESH to create legendas on walls, useful to visualize how the energy flows around the booth. The end result is a piece of impressive graphic art.
Experimentation, Art and Sensoriality combines together in one single element.
Ippolito Fleitz utilizes our production flexibility and technique to create series of wall mesh.
